title: “I’m going to drop you now, just wait and see” - Fakeout - G1
excerpt: In this week’s episode of I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays (ICYFAR) players had to show their best Fakeouts - tricking their opponents with fake rushes, drops and tech paths!  THIS WEEKS ICYFAR CHALLENGE: 1A - You arent allowed to micro your units. Interpretation is as always up to you! Send submissions
